name: xwing-microhangars
description: I love the microhangars made by [SirWilli](https://sirwillibald.com/games/x-wing-miniatures-games/microhangars-2-0/), but it seems like he is no longer updating his versions. I've seen a few other folks try to keep up, but no one has emerged as a new best-in class. So I am to change that with my project.
